item.title: 282 - Spectaculars
item.description: Part of wallowing in weird old stuff unfortunately is that it's hard to keep abreast of what's going on in the last decade or so of gaming, but Jef still pretty much orders any superhero thing if he sees it on sale, and that's what happened here! This time it paid off even, as Spectaculars turned out to be in a form factor neither of us expected but both of us enjoyed, so let us tell you all about it. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Feed: https://feeds.feedburner.com/SystemmasteryPodcasts

item.title: The Dark History of Bearded Ladies & the Victorian Freak Show
item.description:
What would it have really been like to visit a Victorian freak show? Were "freak performers" exploited, or empowered in a world that would likely have otherwise rejected them? And has the Victorian freak show ever really gone away?


Joining Kate today is John Woolf, author of The Wonders: Lifting the Curtain on the Freak Show, Circus and Victorian Age, to take us back to this world and explore its dark side... Feed: https://feeds.acast.com/public/shows/60032060-080e-42c5-ac26-f93fc2b4d612
